metadata.title: CVE-2020-18184 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In PluxXml V5.7,the theme edit function/PluXml/core/admin/parametres_edittpl.php allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary PHP code by placing this code into a template.

criterions.comment: pluxml package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-10-19').
